p: An initial array of 154 reactions was performed using seven diazo substrates ( F1– F7), ten co‐substrates ( G1– G10; plus no co‐substrate) and two dirhodium catalysts. The diazo substrates and co‐substrates were designed to include substituents, such as phenyl, chlorophenyl and branched/cyclic/fluorinated alkyl groups, that may mimic hot spot residues of p53 peptide. Many of these groups are found in known p53/ hDM2 inhibitors.
